# File test/file_column_test.rb, line 307
  def test_delete_saved_image
    e = Entry.new("image" => uploaded_file(file_path("kerb.jpg"), "image/jpeg", "kerb.jpg"))
    assert e.save
    local_path = e.image
    e.image = nil
    assert_nil e.image
    assert File.exists?(local_path), "file '#{local_path}' should not be deleted until transaction is saved"
    assert e.save
    assert_nil e.image
    assert !File.exists?(local_path)
    e.reload
    assert_nil e["image"]
    e = Entry.find(e.id)
    assert_nil e.image
  end
